ingredients.ingredient: 1 medium head garlic, peeled and minced
2 pounds large prawns - peeled, deveined and butterflied
1 medium head garlic, peeled and minced

cookingTips: Butterfly prawns for elegant presentation and even cooking
Use generous amounts of garlic and butter for an indulgent sauce
Fresh parsley added at the end brightens the rich tomato-butter sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize the passion of simple, quality ingredients working together - butter, tomatoes, and garlic - with proper timing to keep prawns tender.
